[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Demon Continent:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Demon Continent:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] [(1) Send this to Memory] When this is Reversed in Battle, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Rimuru, Reincarnation from Another World" in your Waiting Room and place it Rested to the Slot this was in, and for the turn, that Character gains ::Resist Pierce::, ::Resist Physical Attack::, ::Cancel Pain::, ::Cancel Temperature::, ::Resist Electricity::, ::Resist Paralysis::, ::Predation::, and ::Great Sage::.

[C] If you are Level 2 or higher, this gains the following ability. "[S] [Put this in the Waiting Room] Choose up to 1 'Rimuru, Bond of Friendship' in your hand and place it in the Slot this was in."
[A] BOND/"Rimuru, Bond of Friendship" [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] For each of your other ::Demon Continent:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Demon Continent:: Character, this gains +1 Soul for the turn. (Put the revealed card back)

[C] This cannot Side Attack.

[C] All your other ::Demon Continent:: Characters gain +1000 Power.

[C] For each Marker under this, this gains +1000 Power.

[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[C] All your other ::Demon Continent:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[S] [(1)] Choose a Level 0 or lower Character in your Opponent's Front Row and put it in the Waiting Room.
